name: Hula Blade
description:
Embark with the Bro-Tastic Hurcules on an adventure that will make your head, and hips spin! Equip the Hula Axe and enter the Dungeon of Questionable Fantasy Continuity to mow down evil foes. Take on the Dungeon Master all while asking the very important question, "Just how long can this Bro Hula?" Created in 72 hours for the #indiesvspewdiepie 2014 jam

- Controller support!
